mapper.select: select a.no, a.reason, to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, a.accept, a.member_no as memberNo, a.IDENTITY, a.key_no as keyNo, b.id as id from accusation a,member b where b.no=a.member_no order by a.no desc

select a.no, a.reason,to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, a.accept, a.member_no as memberNo, a.IDENTITY, a.key_no as keyNo, b.id as id from accusation a,member b where b.no=a.member_no and a.no=#{no}
